channel.title: Finance on Lucas Kohorst
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on Lucas Kohorst

item.title: Predicting Stock Prices with Python
item.description: Investing in the stock market used to require a ton of capital and a broker that would take a cut from your earnings. Then Robinhood disrupted the industry allowing you to invest as little as $1 and avoid a broker altogether. Robinhood and apps like it have opened up investing to anyone with a connected device and gave non-investors the opportunity to profit from the newest tech start-up. “space gray iPhone X turned on” by rawpixel on Unsplash
